Html: Dear All, Please Someone Show me how to Consume a WCF Service that allows only authenticated Users. My Client application is WPF using Prism Platform. thanks in Advance. I also need to know how to supply UserName And Password to the Service from Prism

I'm afraid this really has absolutely nothing to do with Prism itself. Prism is a framework for structuring your UI and makes no presumptions about what kinds of things you might be doing in your view models or client side services. I would normally encapsulate all my WCF calls in a client side service that is injected into my view models, but the use of WCF from there has nothing to do with Prism, and as a result, guidance or samples around how to use WCF are outside the scope of the Prism team.

However, I do address exactly what you are asking in my Pluralsight course "WCF Jumpstart" which you can find here: http://www.pluralsight.com/courses/wcf-jumpstart. If you do not have Pluralsight access, contact me by email brian.noyes at gmail and I can get you a one month pass to watch it (and other WCF course there such as Miguel Castro's WCF End-to-End course, which picks up where mine leaves off and digs deeper into most aspects of WCF.

BrianNoyes
